name: Memory cards
description:
The game is very simple. The concept came to me while visiting a museum. There was a robot playing this game but with colored cards. I thought that this might be a fun way to learn new words!

So the aim is to find pairs of the same cards while memorizing the words.

In the future some feautures should be added: choosing language, cards sets and the number of the cards.

Created by Udjiniia
